data.title: Top 7 Documentary Wedding Videographers in Horseshoe Beach, FL
data.meta_description: Find your perfect documentary wedding videographers in Horseshoe Beach, FL at Zola. We'll help you narrow down your videographer search in minutes.
data.text:
Nice to meet you! I'm Hannah. I'm a full-time wedding and elopement videographer & photographer with a passion for creating that runs deep. I live in Maine in the summer and I reside in Florida during the winter! I've made it my mission to create stunning, timeless images & videos that will be treasured for years to come. I specializes in capturing the candid, intimate moments that make your wedding or elopement unique and special.

Hello, friends! We're Robert and Adrianna and congratulations on 1) GETTING MARRIED and 2) Meeting your new bffs (Hint: it's us.) We aim to get to know our couples as friends before we show up on your wedding day. Why? We want to know who you are, why your guests mean so much to you, and what every carefully planned detail means to you so we can create a video that means so much more than just a pretty thing to post on social media. Every Golden View Video is unique to each couple and we'll work hand in hand with you to create your video and preserve the memory that you'll love.

Adam Pressley Films is proud to offer a unique style of high definition video. Our sole purpose is to produce a masterpiece film of your special day, filled with laughter and emotion that you will surely cherish forever. We are a team that will work closely with you before, during and after the event to ensure your wedding video is a unique reflection of your relationship and wedding day. We focus on upscale wedding videography and personal promotional videos.

Aaron Creamer is a full time wedding filmmaker and photographer based in Tampa, Florida. He has filmed 100's of weddings since his first wedding in 2018 and is fully insured to work at all venues and Tampa Film Company is a preferred Wedding Videographer at many of the best wedding venues in Florida.

A team of cinematic storytellers || We care about creating cinematic wedding films that are authentic, timeless, and sincere. Our approach to filmmaking is minimal; we don't want your wedding to feel like an overproduced photoshoot. That's where our roots in documentary filmmaking come in. We have served some of the biggest brands in the world like Frito-Lay, Penguin Publishing, and Marmot Outdoor Gear. We bring that same passion for storytelling to weddings and elopements. Headquartered in Portland, Oregon we serve the entire West Coast. Our cinematographers are based across multiple states. Check out our website to see more films

Greetings, I'm Josue, the proud owner of Trust in Light Studios. We're your go-to experts in crafting captivating wedding video narratives. While we call Wisconsin and Illinois home, we're always ready to hit the road for your special day. My journey began with a deep love for wedding photography, and over time, we've skillfully incorporated the art of video storytelling into our services. Our dedicated team works tirelessly to create a seamless and unobtrusive experience for you and your partner. Don't hesitate to reach out â€“ we're here to make your wedding memories shine!
